messages.msgSnippet: Hi! My name is Nadine. I m unschooling my 2 boys, Ben, 5 and Jeff 21 months. We decided to homeschool when ben was a baby, and naturally fell into unschooling.
messages.messageBody:
Hi! My name is Nadine. I'm unschooling my 2 boys, Ben, 5 and Jeff 21 months. We decided to homeschool when ben was a baby, and naturally fell into unschooling. We live in Louisiana, and are fortunate to be part of a large, supportive homeschooling community. We hae a few unschooling friends, so never feel odd about our choices.
I am pleased to have found this group. It is alwasys nice to have the support of other in a similar situation.



Nadine
Mami to Ben and Jeffrey
Creator of Strawberry Baby Slings
http://tinyurl.com/bw9fl
Read our Blog!
http://www.xanga.com/StrawberrySchool


---------------------------------
